sources.title: Carter's Army (1970)
sources.description: A racist officer is put in charge of an all-black squad of troops charged with the mission of blowing up an important hydro-dam in Nazi Germany. Their failure would delay the Allies' advance into Germany, thus prolonging the war. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/carters-army-1970/

sources.title: Carter's Army (1970) Richard Pryor - Drama, War Movie
sources.description:
A racist officer is put in charge of a squad of black troops charged with taking an important bridge from the Germans.

AKA: Black Brigade 
Director: George McCowan
Writers: Aaron Spelling, David Kidd
Stars: Stephen Boyd, Roosevelt Grier, Moses Gunn, Robert Hooks, Susan Oliver, Glynn Turman, Billy Dee Williams & Richard Pryor
Genres: Classics, Drama, War

sources.title: Carter's Army (Black Brigade)
sources.description: Title: Carter's Army Summary: A racist officer is put in charge of a squad of black troops charged with taking an important bridge from the Germans. Directed by: George McCowan Actors: Stephen Boyd, Robert Hooks, Susan Oliver Production Company: Thomas/Spelling Productions Release Date: TV Movie 27 January 1970 Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 A racist officer is put in charge of a squad of black troops charged with taking an important bridge from the Germans.
